description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Tarragon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken & Tarragon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread 8 slices of medium sliced bread with softened butter. Mix 200g shredded cooked chicken breast with 3 tbs mayonnaise, 1 1/2tbs wholegrain mustard, 1 tbs finely chopped tarragon, and salt and black pepper.
Spread the chicken mixture on 4 of the slices and top with the remaining 4 slices. Cut off the crusts using a serrated knife and discard. Cut the sandwiches into 6 mini sandwiches to serve.
